ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Guild/GM application (Bertoxx)
ygData.msgSnippet: I applied and got in.  The test was really hard, I studied before taking it.  I don t know if they re still taking applications or not ... ~Nymue~ ... =====
ygData.messageBody:
I applied and got in. The test was really hard, I
studied before taking it. I don't know if they're
still taking applications or not ...

~Nymue~
